verbs.description: [V: is] rent control [ARG2: the] answer to [ARG2: sky - high prices] [ARG1: bay area voters skeptical a rent - controlled apartment in the bay area is a coveted find that tenants will hang onto as long as possible so why is a california ballot measure that would allow cities to expand rent control not just losing here but trailing by a wider margin than it is statewide proposition 10 was lagging in a recent poll of likely voters by the nonpartisan public policy institute of california 48 percent to 36 percent in the bay area it was losing 32 percent to 54 percent attorney san pablo] santa rosa san francisco oakland san mateo mark baldassare central valley danville california san francisco bay area sacramento bureau mark savage lance wood writer richmond steve maviglio pacifica melody gutierrez the sacramento bee danville public policy institute of california los gatos burlingame rent control director kathryn mills california california apartment association berkeley mary chandler bay area mike gibbs paul hawkins san francisco chronicle jim costa mountain [ARG1: view congressman]

is rent control the answer to sky - high prices bay area voters skeptical a [ARG0: rent] - [V: controlled] [ARG1: apartment] in the bay area is a coveted find that tenants will hang onto as long as possible so why is a california ballot measure that would allow cities to expand rent control not just losing here but trailing by a wider margin than it is statewide proposition 10 was lagging in a recent poll of likely voters by the nonpartisan public policy institute of california 48 percent to 36 percent in the bay area it was losing 32 percent to 54 percent attorney san pablo santa rosa san francisco oakland san mateo mark baldassare central valley danville california san francisco bay area sacramento bureau mark savage lance wood writer richmond steve maviglio pacifica melody gutierrez the sacramento bee danville public policy institute of california los gatos burlingame rent control director kathryn mills california california apartment association berkeley mary chandler bay area mike gibbs paul hawkins san francisco chronicle jim costa mountain view congressman
